sql.if: AND (a.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR a.`ip` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR a.`port` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.`id`)
FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_detail` a

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`type_id`, a.`type_name`, a.`type_label`, a.`maintenance_window`, a.`description`, a.`network_area`, a.`ip`, a.`inspect_status`, a.`inspect_time`, a.`monitor_status`, a.`monitor_time`, b.`bg_id`, b.`bg_name`, c.`allip_id`, c.`allip_ip`, c.`allip_label`, e.`user_id`, e.`user_name`, e.`user_uuid`, f.`state_id`, f.`state_name`, g.`datacenter_id`, g.`datacenter_name`, h.`env_id`, h.`env_name`, n.`cluster_id`, n.`cluster_type_id`, n.`cluster_name` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_os` a LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_bg` b ON b.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_allip` c ON c.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_owner` e ON e.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_state` f ON f.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_datacenter` g on g.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice_env` h on h.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_os_oscluster` n ON n.`resource_id` = a.`id` WHERE a.`id` IN
#{id}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`type_id`, a.`type_name`, a.`type_label`, a.`maintenance_window`, a.`description`, a.`network_area`, a.`ip`, a.`inspect_status`, a.`inspect_time`, a.`monitor_status`, a.`monitor_time`, b.`bg_id`, b.`bg_name`, c.`allip_id`, c.`allip_ip`, c.`allip_label`, e.`user_id`, e.`user_name`, e.`user_uuid`, f.`state_id`, f.`state_name`, g.`datacenter_id`, g.`datacenter_name`, h.`env_id`, h.`env_name` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_storage` a LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_bg` b ON b.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_allip` c ON c.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_owner` e ON e.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_state` f ON f.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_datacenter` g on g.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice_env` h on h.`resource_id` = a.`id` WHERE a.`id` IN
#{id}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`type_id`, a.`type_name`, a.`type_label`, a.`maintenance_window`, a.`description`, a.`network_area`, a.`ip`, a.`inspect_status`, a.`inspect_time`, a.`monitor_status`, a.`monitor_time`, b.`bg_id`, b.`bg_name`, c.`allip_id`, c.`allip_ip`, c.`allip_label`, e.`user_id`, e.`user_name`, e.`user_uuid`, f.`state_id`, f.`state_name`, g.`datacenter_id`, g.`datacenter_name`, h.`env_id`, h.`env_name` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_netdev` a LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_bg` b ON b.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_allip` c ON c.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_owner` e ON e.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_state` f ON f.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_datacenter` g on g.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice_env` h on h.`resource_id` = a.`id` WHERE a.`id` IN
#{id}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`type_id`, a.`type_name`, a.`type_label`, a.`maintenance_window`, a.`description`, a.`network_area`, a.`ip`, a.`inspect_status`, a.`inspect_time`, a.`monitor_status`, a.`monitor_time`, b.`bg_id`, b.`bg_name`, c.`allip_id`, c.`allip_ip`, c.`allip_label`, e.`user_id`, e.`user_name`, e.`user_uuid`, f.`state_id`, f.`state_name`, g.`datacenter_id`, g.`datacenter_name`, h.`env_id`, h.`env_name`, m.`port`, n.`cluster_id`, n.`cluster_type_id`, n.`cluster_name` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_appinstance` a LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_bg` b ON b.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_allip` c ON c.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_owner` e ON e.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_state` f ON f.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_datacenter` g on g.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice_env` h on h.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice` m ON m.`id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_appinstance_appinstancecluster` n ON n.`resource_id` = a.`id` WHERE a.`id` IN
#{id}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`type_id`, a.`type_name`, a.`type_label`, a.`maintenance_window`, a.`description`, a.`network_area`, a.`ip`, a.`inspect_status`, a.`inspect_time`, a.`monitor_status`, a.`monitor_time`, b.`bg_id`, b.`bg_name`, c.`allip_id`, c.`allip_ip`, c.`allip_label`, e.`user_id`, e.`user_name`, e.`user_uuid`, f.`state_id`, f.`state_name`, g.`datacenter_id`, g.`datacenter_name`, h.`env_id`, h.`env_name`, m.`port`, n.`cluster_id`, n.`cluster_type_id`, n.`cluster_name` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_dbinstance` a LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_bg` b ON b.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_allip` c ON c.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_owner` e ON e.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_state` f ON f.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_datacenter` g on g.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice_env` h on h.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice` m ON m.`id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_dbinstance_dbcluster` n ON n.`resource_id` = a.`id` WHERE a.`id` IN
#{id}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`type_id`, a.`type_name`, a.`type_label`, a.`maintenance_window`, a.`description`, a.`network_area`, a.`ip`, a.`inspect_status`, a.`inspect_time`, a.`monitor_status`, a.`monitor_time`, b.`bg_id`, b.`bg_name`, c.`allip_id`, c.`allip_ip`, c.`allip_label`, e.`user_id`, e.`user_name`, e.`user_uuid`, f.`state_id`, f.`state_name`, g.`datacenter_id`, g.`datacenter_name`, h.`env_id`, h.`env_name`, m.`port` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_appinstance_cluster` a LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_bg` b ON b.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_allip` c ON c.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_owner` e ON e.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_state` f ON f.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_datacenter` g on g.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice_env` h on h.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice` m ON m.`id` = a.`id` WHERE a.`id` IN
#{id}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`type_id`, a.`type_name`, a.`type_label`, a.`maintenance_window`, a.`description`, a.`network_area`, a.`ip`, a.`inspect_status`, a.`inspect_time`, a.`monitor_status`, a.`monitor_time`, b.`bg_id`, b.`bg_name`, c.`allip_id`, c.`allip_ip`, c.`allip_label`, e.`user_id`, e.`user_name`, e.`user_uuid`, f.`state_id`, f.`state_name`, g.`datacenter_id`, g.`datacenter_name`, h.`env_id`, h.`env_name`, m.`port` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_db_cluster` a LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_bg` b ON b.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_allip` c ON c.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_owner` e ON e.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_state` f ON f.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_datacenter` g on g.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice_env` h on h.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice` m ON m.`id` = a.`id` WHERE a.`id` IN
#{id}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`type_id`, a.`type_name`, a.`type_label`, a.`maintenance_window`, a.`description`, a.`network_area`, a.`ip`, a.`inspect_status`, a.`inspect_time`, a.`monitor_status`, a.`monitor_time`, b.`bg_id`, b.`bg_name`, c.`allip_id`, c.`allip_ip`, c.`allip_label`, e.`user_id`, e.`user_name`, e.`user_uuid`, f.`state_id`, f.`state_name`, g.`datacenter_id`, g.`datacenter_name`, h.`env_id`, h.`env_name`, m.`port` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_accessendpoint` a LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_bg` b ON b.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_allip` c ON c.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_owner` e ON e.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_state` f ON f.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_datacenter` g on g.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice_env` h on h.`resource_id` = a.`id` LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice` m ON m.`id` = a.`id` WHERE a.`id` IN
#{id}
SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, b.`port`, a.`ip` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject` a LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice` b on b.`id` = a.`id` where a.`id` = #{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`ip`,a.`type_id` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject` a where a.`id` in
#{id}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`ip`, a.`port` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_softwareservice` a where a.`id` in
#{id}

SELECT a.`id` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject` a WHERE a.`id` IN
#{id}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_account`
`name` like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

select a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`account`, a.`password` as passwordCipher, b.name as protocol, b.id as protocolId, b.`port` as protocolPort, a.`fcu`, a.`fcd`, a.`lcu`, a.`lcd` from `cmdb_resourcecenter_account` a JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_account_protocol` b ON a.`protocol_id` = b.`id` where a.`id` = #{value}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`account`, a.`password` as passwordCipher, b.name as protocol, b.`port`, a.`fcu`, a.`fcd`, a. `lcu`, a.`lcd` FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_account` a JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_account_protocol` b ON a.`protocol_id`=b.`id` WHERE a.`id` IN
#{id}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_account` a JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_account_protocol` b ON b.`id`=a.`protocol_id`
and a.`name` like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and b.`name` in
#{item}

SELECT `id`, `name` FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_account`
`name` like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `cmdb_tag`
`name` like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

select count(1) from `cmdb_tag`
`name` like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

select `id`, `name`, `description`, (select count(1) from `cmdb_resourcecenter_resource_tag` where `tag_id` = `id`) as assetsCount from `cmdb_tag`
`name` like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by `id` desc
limit #{startNum}, #{pageSize}

SELECT `id` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_appsystem`
AND (`name` LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR `abbr_name` LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

SELECT a.`id` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_appmodule` a
AND a.`name` LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT DISTINCT b.`resource_id` FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_account` a JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_resource_account` b ON b.`account_id` = a.`id` JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_account_protocol` c ON c.`id`=a.`protocol_id` WHERE c.`id` IN
#{protocolId}

SELECT DISTINCT a.`resource_id` FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_resource_tag` a WHERE a.`tag_id` IN
#{tagId}

SELECT `id` FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_account` WHERE `id` IN
#{id}

SELECT `id`, `name`, `description` FROM `cmdb_tag` WHERE `name` IN
#{name}

SELECT `id`, `name`, `description` FROM `cmdb_tag` WHERE `id` IN
#{id}

SELECT `resource_id` AS resourceId, `account_id` AS accountId FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_resource_account` WHERE `resource_id` in
#{resourceId}

SELECT `resource_id` AS resourceId, `tag_id` AS tagId FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_resource_tag` WHERE `resource_id` in
#{resourceId}

SELECT `id`, `name`, `description` FROM `cmdb_tag` WHERE `id` IN
#{id}

SELECT count(DISTINCT a.id) FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_resource_account` c JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject` a ON a.id = c.resource_id JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_account` b ON b.id = c.account_id JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_account_protocol` d ON d.id = b.protocol_id
a.`name` like concat('%', #{accountComponentVo.keyword}, '%') or a.`ip` =#{accountComponentVo.keyword}
SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`account`, a.`password`, a.`protocol_id` as protocolId, a.`fcu`, a.`fcd`, a.`lcu`, a.`lcd` FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_account` a where a.`name` = #{value}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`account`, a.`protocol_id` AS protocolId, a.`password` as passwordCipher, crap.`name` as protocol, crap.`port` as protocolPort, a.`fcu`, a.`fcd`, a.`lcu`, crai.`ip`, a.`lcd` FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_account` a left join `cmdb_resourcecenter_account_protocol` crap on a.protocol_id = crap.id left join `cmdb_resourcecenter_account_ip` crai on a.id = crai.`account_id` WHERE crai.`ip` IN
#{ip}

SELECT `account_id` AS accountId, `tag_id` AS tagId FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_account_tag` WHERE `account_id` in
#{accountId}

select `id`, `name`, `port` from `cmdb_resourcecenter_account_protocol`
`name` like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or `port` like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by lcd desc
SELECT `resource_id` AS resourceId, `account_id` AS accountId FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_resource_account` WHERE `account_id` = #{value}

SELECT crap.name as protocol, cra.id, cra.`account`, cra.`password` as passwordCipher, crra.`resource_id` as resourceId, crap.port as protocolPort, cra.`protocol_id` as protocolId FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_resource_account` crra LEFT JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_account` cra ON crra.`account_id` = cra.`id` LEFT JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_account_protocol` crap ON crap.`id` = cra.`protocol_id` WHERE crra.`resource_id` = #{resourceId} AND crra.account_id = #{accountId}

SELECT cra.id, cra.`account`, cra.`password` as passwordCipher, cra.`protocol_id` as protocolId from cmdb_resourcecenter_account_ip crai LEFT JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_account` cra ON crai.`account_id` = cra.`id` WHERE crai.ip = #{host} AND crai.account_id = #{accountId}

SELECT cra.id, cra.`account`, cra.`password` as passwordCipher, cra.`protocol_id` as protocolId from cmdb_resourcecenter_account_ip crai LEFT JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_account` cra ON crai.`account_id` = cra.`id` LEFT JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_account_protocol` crap ON crap.`id` = cra.`protocol_id` WHERE crai.ip = #{host} AND crap.port = #{port}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`name`, m.`port`, a.`ip`
FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_detail` a WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT c.`resource_id` FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_resource_account` c JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_account` d on d.`id` = c.`account_id` JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_account_protocol` e ON e.`id`= d.`protocol_id`
and d.`account` = #{account}
and e.name = #{protocol} WHERE c.`resource_id` = a.`id` )

SELECT `resource_id` AS resourceId, `script_id` AS scriptId, `config` as configStr FROM `cmdb_resourcecenter_resource_script` WHERE `resource_id` in
#{resourceId}
select `resource_id` as resourceId, `script_id` as scriptId, `config` as configStr from `cmdb_resourcecenter_resource_script` WHERE `resource_id` = #{value}

SELECT cra.id, cra.name, cra.account, crap.`name` as protocol, crap.`port` as protocolPort, cra.`fcu`, cra.`fcd`, cra.`lcu`, cra.`lcd` FROM cmdb_resourcecenter_resource_account crra left join cmdb_resourcecenter_account cra on cra.id = crra.account_id left join cmdb_resourcecenter_account_protocol crap on crap.id = cra.protocol_id WHERE crra.resource_id = #{value}
select a.`id`, a.`name`, a.`description` from `cmdb_tag` a JOIN `cmdb_resourcecenter_account_tag` c ON c.tag_id = a.id where c.`account_id` = #{value}
